title: Increase logo size and visibility

requirements.text: Increase the size of the logo image (nova logo-1.png) in the AppLayout header to make it more prominent and visible to users

quotes: deixe a logo maior e mais visivel

acceptanceCriteria: Logo in AppLayout.tsx is visibly larger than current implementation
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
Logo fits well within the header layout on both desktop and mobile viewports
Logo does not cause layout shifts or overflow issues

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the logo image file itself
Modifying other header elements beyond the logo
